title: Worth: The Testimony of Johnny St. James

sources.title: Worth: The Testimony of Johnny St. James | Full Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**

Worth: The Testimony of Johnny St. James - Johnny St. James was a young seminary student who lost his wife to a drunk driver. With his reason for living gone, John lost his faith and turned to alcohol. Ten years later, John is finally ready to get his life back on track. With his best friend Hickey ('Eric Roberts') in tow John attends his first AA meeting. He soon finds that his road to recovery tested when he runs into the man who ran down his wife.

2012
Stars: Jeffrey Johnson, Vincent Irizarry, Veronica Rodriguez, Corey Feldman
